H0.text: In which country would you find the wine-producing region known as 'Casablanca Valley'. Argentina

H1.text: In which country would you find the wine-producing region known as 'Casablanca Valley'. Australia

H2.text: In which country would you find the wine-producing region known as 'Casablanca Valley'. Chile

H3.text: In which country would you find the wine-producing region known as 'Casablanca Valley'. Cile

A4.text: The Casablanca Valley is a wine-producing region 75 km (47 mi) northwest of Santiago.

A5.text: It is a Denomination of Origin (DO) defined by the Chilean Appellation system.
